contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Belgium Municipality |name=Wichelen |picture= |picture-width=260px |picture-legend= |map=WichelenLocatie.png |map-legend=Location of Wichelen in [[East Flanders]] |arms=Wichelen wapen.gif |flag=Wichelen Belgium.svg |region={{BE-REG-FLE}} |community={{BE-NL}} |province={{BE-PROV-OV}} |arrondissement=[[Arrondissement of Dendermonde|Dendermonde]] |nis=42026 |pyramid-date=1 January 2006 |0-19=21.75 |20-64=60.14 |65=17.15 |foreigners=0.88 |foreigners-date=1 July 2005 |mayor=Kenneth Taylor |majority=Samen, [[SP.A]]-[[Spirit (Belgium)|Spirit]] |postal-codes=9260 |telephone-area=09 |web=[http://www.wichelen.be/ www.wichelen.be] |lat_deg=51 |lat_min=00 |lon_deg=03 |lon_min=58 }} '''Wichelen''' is a [[municipality]] located in the [[Denderstreek]] in the [[Belgium|Belgian]] province of [[East Flanders]]. The municipality comprises the towns of [[Schellebelle]], [[Serskamp]] and Wichelen proper. Wichelen is crossed by the [[Molenbeek (Erpe-Mere Bovenschelde)|Molenbeek]] in Schellebelle, Serskamp and Wichelen. On January 1, 2006 Wichelen had a total population of 11,145. The total area is 22.87 km² which gives a [[population density]] of 487 inhabitants per km². ==Gallery== <gallery> Image:Belgium, Schellebelle, Church.JPG|The church of Schellebelle overlooks the [[Scheldt]] File:Serskamp (Wichelen) - Church.jpg|Sint-Denijs church in [[Serskamp]] File:Schellebelle - Roephuisje - Belgium.jpg|Former "roephuisje" and prison for one person in Schellebelle </gallery> ==References== {{Commonscat}} {{reflist}} ==External links== *{{Official website|http://www.wichelen.be}} {{nl icon}} *[http://www.grootwichelen.be The reference for Wichelen ] {{nl icon}} {{East_Flanders}} [[Category:Municipalities of East Flanders]] [[Category:Wichelen]] {{EastFlanders-geo-stub}}
